data.text:
From the inside it's Special Week! From the inside 
it's Special Week! Extending her lead from 3 
to 4 lengths, now she cross the goal!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>From the inside it's Special Week! From the inside 
<story>it's Special Week! Extending her lead from 3 
<story>to 4 lengths, now she cross the goal!

data.text:
As her first victory in a Major, the 
[Kisaragi Sho] has been conquered!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>As her first victory in a Major, the 
<story>[Kisaragi Sho] has been conquered!

data.text:
[Special Week swept away her previous loss with an 
overwhelming victory!] [With the Classics in sight 
for Special Week, next is the Yayoi Sho!]
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
<story>[Special Week swept away her previous loss with an 
<story>overwhelming victory!] [With the Classics in sight 
<story>for Special Week, next is the Yayoi Sho!]

data.text:
Ehehe… seeing yourself in an article, 
is a little embarrassing, isn't it?
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Ehehe… seeing yourself in an article, 
<story>is a little embarrassing, isn't it?

data.text:
Spe-chan, being the victor is best! 
Since the fans are hoping for a strong Uma Musume!
data.name: El Condor Pasa
data.processed:
<story>Spe-chan, being the victor is best! 
<story>Since the fans are hoping for a strong Uma Musume!

data.text:
When a classmate is getting this kind of attention, 
somehow it makes you feel kinda proud too, huh?
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
<story>When a classmate is getting this kind of attention, 
<story>somehow it makes you feel kinda proud too, huh?

data.text:
You say that but, Sei-chan is undefeated so far- and they're 
saying you're a strong contender for the Classic races.
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>You say that but, Sei-chan is undefeated so far- and they're 
<story>saying you're a strong contender for the Classic races.

data.text: Well～, isn't that just a coincidence?
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed: <story>Well～, isn't that just a coincidence?

data.text: Everyone seems to be in top condition, don't they?
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed: <story>Everyone seems to be in top condition, don't they?

data.text:
Ooohoohoohoo! If we're talking about strong 
contenders, you can't exclude me, King!
data.name: King Halo
data.processed:
<story>Ooohoohoohoo! If we're talking about strong 
<story>contenders, you can't exclude me, King!

data.text: King-chan, in your last race, it's too bad that you got 2nd.
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>King-chan, in your last race, it's too bad that you got 2nd.

data.text:
O-Oohoohoohoo! Even if I lose I won't be defeated, 
that's what it means to be a first class Uma Musume!
data.name: King Halo
data.processed:
<story>O-Oohoohoohoo! Even if I lose I won't be defeated, 
<story>that's what it means to be a first class Uma Musume!

data.text:
That aside, Special Week-san, your next race 
is the [Yayoi Sho] is it not?
data.name: King Halo
data.processed:
<story>That aside, Special Week-san, your next race 
<story>is the [Yayoi Sho] is it not?

data.text: Yeah, that's right, but why are you asking?
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Yeah, that's right, but why are you asking?

data.text:
In that case, before a real Classic race, 
I'll have you show me what you can do.
data.name: King Halo
data.processed:
<story>In that case, before a real Classic race, 
<story>I'll have you show me what you can do.

data.text: My next race is also the [Yayoi Sho] after all.
data.name: King Halo
data.processed: <story>My next race is also the [Yayoi Sho] after all.

data.text: …Eh?
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>…Eh?

data.text: Huh? Wait, Sei-chan, isn't your next race the [Yayoi Sho] too?
data.name: El Condor Pasa
data.processed: <story>Huh? Wait, Sei-chan, isn't your next race the [Yayoi Sho] too?

data.text: Yeah, King and Spe-chan, go easy on me～
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed: <story>Yeah, King and Spe-chan, go easy on me～

data.text: Eh…? Eh…?
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Eh…? Eh…?

data.text: EEEEEEHHHHH～?!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>EEEEEEHHHHH～?!

data.text:
[Seiun Sky has decisively pulled away! 
She's pulled really far ahead and now, crosses the goal!]
data.name: TV Announcer
data.processed:
<story>[Seiun Sky has decisively pulled away! 
<story>She's pulled really far ahead and now, crosses the goal!]

data.text:
In her next race, the [Yayoi Sho], finally, 
it'll be the first contest between Special 
Week and the champions of her generation.
data.processed:
<story>In her next race, the [Yayoi Sho], finally, 
<story>it'll be the first contest between Special 
<story>Week and the champions of her generation.

data.text:
She was working hard to produce results, so I also had to give 
my all to respond to that and go through these documents.
data.processed:
<story>She was working hard to produce results, so I also had to give 
<story>my all to respond to that and go through these documents.

data.text: Staying behind again to do more research?
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>Staying behind again to do more research?

data.text:
Even at the best of times, it won't be easy to obtain 
glory in a classic race, especially since we're 
competing with the "Golden Generation".
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Even at the best of times, it won't be easy to obtain 
<story>glory in a classic race, especially since we're 
<story>competing with the "Golden Generation".

data.text:
But, Spe is seriously doing her best to grasp it. 
For the sake of her dream, I need to properly support her.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>But, Spe is seriously doing her best to grasp it. 
<story>For the sake of her dream, I need to properly support her.

data.text:
But, Spe is seriously doing her best to grasp it. 
For the sake of her dream, I need to properly support her.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>But, Spe is seriously doing her best to grasp it. 
<story>For the sake of her dream, I need to properly support her.

data.text: …Trainer-san, you truly never change it seems.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>…Trainer-san, you truly never change it seems.

data.text:
Becoming an Uma Musume's support, and taking hold 
of their dream together. Ever since conquering the 
Tenno Sho, you've always been like that.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>Becoming an Uma Musume's support, and taking hold 
<story>of their dream together. Ever since conquering the 
<story>Tenno Sho, you've always been like that.

data.text:
While saying that, there was a deep 
emotion in Mejiro McQueen's gaze.
data.processed:
<story>While saying that, there was a deep 
<story>emotion in Mejiro McQueen's gaze.

data.text:
Her dream of "Conquering the Tenno Sho", for someone who had 
just recently been put in charge of a team it was a huge dream.
data.processed:
<story>Her dream of "Conquering the Tenno Sho", for someone who had 
<story>just recently been put in charge of a team it was a huge dream.

data.text:
Compared to when Team was on the verge 
of breaking up, it's become quite lively.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Compared to when Team was on the verge 
<story>of breaking up, it's become quite lively.

data.text: Yes, truly…
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>Yes, truly…

data.text:
That said, this time, the dream is quite difficult, isn't it? 
After all, the goal is to "Become Japan's #1 Uma Musume".
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>That said, this time, the dream is quite difficult, isn't it? 
<story>After all, the goal is to "Become Japan's #1 Uma Musume".

data.text:
While saying it would be difficult, Mejiro McQueen looked like 
she was having fun talking about it.
data.processed:
<story>While saying it would be difficult, Mejiro McQueen looked like 
<story>she was having fun talking about it.

data.text:
She probably also believes in it. That Team 's 
Special Week could fulfill her dream.

choices.text: I'll definitely show you we can do it

data.processed:
<story>She probably also believes in it. That Team 's 
<story>Special Week could fulfill her dream.

data.text: We, as a team, will also do our best.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>We, as a team, will also do our best.

data.text:
Um, and after that… 
[To aim for Japan's #1, first is the Yayoi Sho].
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Um, and after that… 
<story>[To aim for Japan's #1, first is the Yayoi Sho].

data.text: A letter to your mother?
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>A letter to your mother?

data.text:
Yeah, it'd probably be faster to talk over the phone but, it's 
also kind of embarrassing to put it in to words, don't you think?
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Yeah, it'd probably be faster to talk over the phone but, it's 
<story>also kind of embarrassing to put it in to words, don't you think?

data.text:
That's why I'm writing a letter like this. To say I'm doing 
my best to aim for "Japan's #1 Uma Musume"!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>That's why I'm writing a letter like this. To say I'm doing 
<story>my best to aim for "Japan's #1 Uma Musume"!

data.text: …Fufuu
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>…Fufuu

data.text: Huh…? Did… I say something weird just now…?
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Huh…? Did… I say something weird just now…?

data.text:
No, that's not it. I was just thinking that 
Spe-chan really cares for her mother.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>No, that's not it. I was just thinking that 
<story>Spe-chan really cares for her mother.

data.text:
Ehehe… it's because I'm really grateful to my Mom! 
For raising me with so much affection, to both of my Moms!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Ehehe… it's because I'm really grateful to my Mom! 
<story>For raising me with so much affection, to both of my Moms!

data.text: To both of your Mothers… you say?
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>To both of your Mothers… you say?

data.text:
Suzuka-san, I have two Moms. The Mom that gave 
birth to me and, the Mom that raised me.
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Suzuka-san, I have two Moms. The Mom that gave 
<story>birth to me and, the Mom that raised me.

data.text:
From both of those Moms, I've been entrusted with 
the dream of becoming "Japan's #1 Uma Musume".
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>From both of those Moms, I've been entrusted with 
<story>the dream of becoming "Japan's #1 Uma Musume".

data.text: Originally, "Japan's #1" was my birth mother's dream.
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Originally, "Japan's #1" was my birth mother's dream.

data.text:
But, due to circumstances, she wasn't able to run in a single 
race, and she wasn't able to chase after her dream.
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>But, due to circumstances, she wasn't able to run in a single 
<story>race, and she wasn't able to chase after her dream.

data.text:
While she was pregnant with me, it seems that she 
half-joked that it would make her happy if the child she was 
carrying would become "Japan's #1 Uma Musume", or so I'm told.
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>While she was pregnant with me, it seems that she 
<story>half-joked that it would make her happy if the child she was 
<story>carrying would become "Japan's #1 Uma Musume", or so I'm told.

data.text:
And that she wanted to see that dream together with me- 
…but, she passed away shortly after I was born…
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>And that she wanted to see that dream together with me- 
<story>…but, she passed away shortly after I was born…

data.text: Is that so…?
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>Is that so…?

data.text:
Aaahh?! Don't look so down! Besides, I wanted to tell you 
about how great my mom was, so that's why I'm talking about it!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Aaahh?! Don't look so down! Besides, I wanted to tell you 
<story>about how great my mom was, so that's why I'm talking about it!

data.text:
And so, a really good friend of hers took me in, 
became my mom, and raised me as her own.
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>And so, a really good friend of hers took me in, 
<story>became my mom, and raised me as her own.

data.text:
It seems like the moment she'd take her eyes off 
me I'd go running off, and it sounded like I 
was quite a handful as a kid, though…
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>It seems like the moment she'd take her eyes off 
<story>me I'd go running off, and it sounded like I 
<story>was quite a handful as a kid, though…

data.text: …Fufuu.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>…Fufuu.

data.text:
And then, after I had grown a bit, I was told about my birth 
mother's dream — to become "Japan's #1 Uma Musume".
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>And then, after I had grown a bit, I was told about my birth 
<story>mother's dream — to become "Japan's #1 Uma Musume".

data.text:
…Truthfully, I was asked many times whether I really wanted to 
become "Japan's #1 Uma Musume". I was told I didn't need to push 
myself and carry that dream.
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>…Truthfully, I was asked many times whether I really wanted to 
<story>become "Japan's #1 Uma Musume". I was told I didn't need to push 
<story>myself and carry that dream.

data.text:
…But, Spe-chan, becoming "Japan's #1 Uma Musume" 
was what you chose, right?
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>…But, Spe-chan, becoming "Japan's #1 Uma Musume" 
<story>was what you chose, right?

data.text:
Yeah! Becoming "Japan's #1 Uma Musume", 
and making both of my Moms happy!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Yeah! Becoming "Japan's #1 Uma Musume", 
<story>and making both of my Moms happy!

data.text:
Also, when I won my debut race, I made a promise with Suzuka-san, 
right?! That we'll definitely fulfill our dreams!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Also, when I won my debut race, I made a promise with Suzuka-san, 
<story>right?! That we'll definitely fulfill our dreams!

data.text:
For my Moms, and for the sake of the promise I made with 
Suzuka-san, I'll definitely show you I can win the [Yayoi Sho]!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>For my Moms, and for the sake of the promise I made with 
<story>Suzuka-san, I'll definitely show you I can win the [Yayoi Sho]!

data.text: Fufuu, I'm looking forward to it.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>Fufuu, I'm looking forward to it.

data.text: Ehehe… Yeah!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Ehehe… Yeah!
